patthana24.2:1.1: Nahetuṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana24.2:2.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe cattāri …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana24.2:3.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.2:4.1: Nanahetuṃ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.2:5.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.2:6.1: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.2:7.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.2:8.1: Nahetuṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
